titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s2: <*> May 5 = note above "1v," can't read <*> July 5 = "Rethuer"?

body.ab:
1938 KALBFLEISCH I Mrs 27 bis quai d'Orsay Inv 30.51
1 m 1 v B 50 dep 50
May 9 My Country & my People May 18 18 Poet's Life 18 Leave Your Mind Alone extra 2v May 25 May 25 The Nile June 11 paid 10v for 2 days overdue left dep. will renew later June 11 Journalist's Wye June 13 Renewed June 11 - July 11 1938 50v June 23 Lord Dunsany's Autobiography July 29 Mrs Kalbfleish's father Mr Boyton brought back her book and said she would call later and see about renewing subsc and what she owes - meanwhile keeping deposit at Shakespeare & Co Inv 3051 where Rebecca returns subscription ren. 100v 3m Oct 28 Rebecca Nov 24 " " Culture of Cities 2c owes 12c Nov 3 Nov. 10 Eleanor of Aquitaine 1c Nov 22 Nov 10 Old Century Nov 15
1939 TO JAN 28TH II Nov 12 With Malice Toward Some 2v Nov 22 Nov 15 Fifth Column + 49 stories Nov 22 Nov 22 Looking Behind the Censorship Dec 5 Dec 5 China at Crossroads Dec 7 " 5 Long Valley Dec 13 13 Monarchy Extras 20v pd. Dec 30 Dec 30 Long Lance. Jan 11 30 Letters from Benjamin Disraeli Jan 11 Jan 12 Letters of T.E. Lawrence Jan 26 12 Unforgotten Years (paid 24 frs Jan 26 overdue) 3m 1v B May 3 - Aug 3 100v May 3 We'll to the Woods No More May 5 5 Portrait of an Artist <*> May 29 (1v) 17 I think aloud in America (2v) May 29 17 Ulysses (owes 21v) May 30 pd. 30 Clue to HIstory 2v Jun 6 30 I think Aloud in the USA Jun 6 june 9 Pale horse Pale rider. june 13 june 9 Autobiography of W.L. Phelp (& pres) June 17 June 17 World's Body. july 5 Adventures of a Young Man 2v june 20 20 Yearling paid June 20 july 5 5 Bernard's <*> july 10 See if there is something to pay July 10 Benjamin Franklin Dec. 8 + tell her next time. Sub. renewed- Aug. 3 - to Nov. 3. 3m. 1v. B_ 100f July 26. Grapes of Wrath Dec. 8 26 Eleanor of Aquitaine Dec. 8 26 In and about Paris- Dec. 8 26 My Journey to Lhasa Dec. 8 26 Grass Roof Dec. 8 F.B. got books from concierge Dec. 8 - Mrs. K. has dep 50f. left
